about_the_game:
This is a story based DLC, it will add a new story to the game that you can play separately to the main storyline.

To get closer to Izumi, Kotori decides to join a sports club with her.
But the trouble is, she can't play tennis at all! And there's a big 2x2 tournament coming up...

In this DLC, you'll find:
Route with Izumi
Joining a sports club
You can play separately to the main storyline
detailed_description:
This is a story based DLC, it will add a new story to the game that you can play separately to the main storyline.

To get closer to Izumi, Kotori decides to join a sports club with her.
But the trouble is, she can't play tennis at all! And there's a big 2x2 tournament coming up...

In this DLC, you'll find:
Route with Izumi
Joining a sports club
You can play separately to the main storyline

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 1 Gz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: BlackberryNOVA – Sports Club

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/10 (32 bit or 64 bit)
  • Processor: 1 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/10 (32 bit or 64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: To get closer to Izumi, Kotori decides to join a sports club with her.
